name: Avoid unreferenced DB2 tables (PL1)
description: This rule searches for all the DB2 tables that are not referenced i.e. not called.
output:
The report lists all the unreferenced DB2 tables.

It provides following information: 
-  DB2 tables full name
rationale: Unreferenced artifacts like any other examples of dead code make maintenance more difficult and more expensive (modification of unused code).

qualityStandards.name: Dead code
qualityStandards.description: Number of instances where a function or method is unreferenced by any other code item in the application (the application determines the scope of the search for code items that could call a function or method element)
